message: ...Huh? What...
...Oh, right...
I fell asleep on the couch...
Wait.
...What?

name: 蒼葉
message: "...I'm in bed?"
Did I sleepwalk? Is that why I don't remember?
I'm still a bit dazed from having just woken up, but I can hear something going on outside my room.
A delicious smell wafts in through the door. My stomach starts to growl.
Though instinct tells me that nothing good is happening, I first get out of bed and pick up Ren, who was sleeping at my feet.

name: 蓮
message: "Morning, Aoba."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Morning, Ren."
I start toward the door, but that's when I notice it.
...The room is practically sparkling.
It was clean to begin with, but someone clearly polished it up even more.
...I hear the sound of chopping outside.
I leave the room and head down the hall. Something is sitting on the table in the den.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What the..."
The table is covered with food.
There's some giant chicken-looking thing, and soup, and even some kind of fish stew.
It's all stuff I've never seen before, so of course I have no idea how it might taste.

name: クリア
message: "Hm, hmhm, huumm!"
Someone is humming behind the bar counter.

name: 蒼葉
message: "It's him...!"
I turn to the source of the humming...
...and there, I freeze.
